candidates.title: Cleanup
candidates.body:
Listed changes from the commits:

- Cargo.toml dependencies:
  - sorted alphabetically
  - use shorter version identifier with same meaning
- remove unused test variables
- add ; at last statement
- cargo fmt
- same mqttoptions variable name in all examples
- minor things found in #391

This should also simplify the diff of #391 (this will create merge conflicts in #391 first)

candidates.title: Make rustls optional
candidates.body:
Closes #305

Enables the compilation of `rumqttc` without rustls/TLS support by using `--no-default-features` flag during compilation. `rustls` support is enabled by default, otherwise can be enabled with `use_rustls` feature flag.

candidates.title: Fix CI for rumqtt Mac and Windows
candidates.body: Changes to solve issues with CI observed on Windows and Mac OS.

candidates.title: R11
candidates.body:
Closes #350

Upgrades `rumqttd` to v0.10, `rumqttc` to v0.11 and documents relevant changes.

candidates.title: Move code into broker and client crate
candidates.body:
- Move `mqttbytes` code into client and broker crates.
- Move `rumqttlog` into broker.
- Remove code associated with `rumqttmesh`.
- Clean up.

candidates.title: Update how rumqtt is documented
candidates.body: Update and improve documentation within READMEs and rest of the repo

candidates.title: benchmarks: add a version agnostic simple router
rumqttc v5
candidates.body:
Add supports for MQTTv5 to rumqttc, along with following changes (only in v5, v4 not changed):
- Use `Arc<Mutex<VecDeque<Request>>>` instead of async-channel to send requests from client to eventloop
- pkids are returned when calling subscribe from client.
- code for parsing v5 packets copied from mqttbytes, remove its use
- use flume instead of async_channel and pollster
- different (and hopefully more intuitive) APIs, with option to run eventloop in background by default
- No longer supporting informing about outgoing events via eventloop

candidates.title: Update `tokio_rustls` in `rumqttd`
candidates.body: Updates from `tokio_rustls` from 0.22 to 0.23.2. Changes are similar to #336

candidates.title: rumqttc: update rustls to 0.20
candidates.body: Update rumqttc to use version 0.20 of rustls and update all dependent crates.
